DOC.brief_summary: Early preterm premature rupture membrane ( PPROM ) complicate 0.7 % pregnancy . When PPROM occur 24th week , risk fetal neonatal death 70 % . There also high risk neonatal maternal morbidity . When diagnosis PPROM uncertain physical examination , additional test need . These test false positive false negative rate . The gold standard diagnose PPROM amniocentesis dye test . This procedure risk infection abortion.Our hypothesis use cervical cap 6 hour repeat ultrasound exam diagnose rule PPROM case uncertain . Our study group pregnant woman gestational age 14-23 , suspect PPROM .
DOC.brief_title: The Cervical Cap Diagnosis Rupture Membranes Second Trimester
DOC.criteria: Gestational age 1423 Single fetus Suspected rupture membrane Oligohydramnios Vaginal bleeding Suspected chorioamnionitis
